Navigate to other release versions of Doxee Platform Template Designer

[6.6](https://docs.doxee.com/docs/en/template-designer-6-6)

[6.7](https://docs.doxee.com/docs/en/template-designer-6-7)

The creation of multilingual documents is supported through language condition and language branch elements. (see chapters ![](data:image/png;base64,) [Language Switch](/doxee-platform/docs/6-6-template-designer-user-guide-elements-1#language-switch) and ![](data:image/png;base64,) [Language Branch](/doxee-platform/docs/6-6-template-designer-user-guide-elements-1#language-branch))

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Figure 178. Internationalisation*

The button ![](data:image/png;base64,) allows for automatic adding of language condition and language branch elements.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Figure 179. Automatic Internationalisation*
